contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 23rd day of July, 2008, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED for'the reasons ably set-forth in the opinion of the Honorable James Gardner Colins, which opinion is adopted as that of the Supreme Court. See Marcavage v. Rendell, 936 A.2d 188 (Pa.Cmwlth.2007).
